Dwarka, Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Junel0, 2013 POLICY MATTER ~ Technical (137/2013) (Decision taken in the 94mh Meeting of the Authority held on 14.05.2013 vide Agenda Item No.IX) Sub: Delegation of powers to approve award of bids for collection of user fee: In partial modification of Para-1 (ii) (b) of Policy Circular-Technical (131/2013) dated 8ih April 2013 (copy enclosed); the power for acceptance of single bid for collection of user fee is delegated to the Chairman provided it is second bidding and quote is above Annual Potential Collection: 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. k.~l (KV.
